JavaScript Developer (back-end / full-stack)
#—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #600k
–¢—Ä–µ–±—É–µ–º—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: 3‚Äì6 –ª–µ—Ç
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Luminati
–ó–ü: –æ—Ç 5 000 –¥–æ 6 500 $
Description
We're looking for exceptional and experienced back-end and full-stack JavaScript developers, with expertise in HTML, CSS, Angular.js, Bootstrap, React, Node.js. Express and MongoDB.
In this role, you will take full ownership of product and feature development, using cutting-edge technologies, in a fast-paced and professional agile environment.
Responsibilities
End-to-end feature development, from conception to production.
Participate in system design and architecture planning, for optimal software performance.
Take on independent responsibilities, while contributing to the team's collective goals.
Actively learn, adapt and stay up-to-date with the evolving tech landscape, including best practices.
Requirements
Proficiency in JavaScript.
3+ years of hands-on experience in HTML/CSS/JavaScript and related frameworks, as a back-end or full-stack engineer.
In-depth understanding of network protocols and security, including TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP, HTTPS, CORS and WebSockets.
Proficient in system design and architecture to ensure product functionality, performance, scalability, and reliability.
Fast learner, able to work independently and as a team player.
Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills.

–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: –ö–∏–ø—Ä
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Spotware Systems
–ó–ü: –æ—Ç 4 000 –¥–æ 5 000‚Ç¨
Position: SDET / QA Automation Engineer (Javascript /TypeScript)
Spotware Systems is looking for an experienced Senior JavaScript Auto Test Developer to join our office in Limassol.
Responsibilities:
- Defining test cases and acceptance criteria for backend tasks.
- Maintaining existing autotests (about 3000 pcs).
- Preparing new test cases and write code for new autotests.
- Translating existing manual test cases into automated test cases.
- Developing new performance autotests.
Requirements:
- Strong knowledge of Javascript / Typescript.
- Deep understanding of Playwright.
- Confident in integration testing.
- Confident in developing automated test on websocket.
- Experience of working with CI/CD pipelines in Gitlab.
- Experience of using mocking libraries.
- Experience in application containerization will be a plus.
We offer:
- Competitive remuneration.
- Private medical insurance.
- Full relocation support, including work permit arrangements.
- Welcome baby bonus.
- Birthday voucher.
- Fully equipped office with daily fruits, pizza on Thursdays and snacks on Fridays.
- Opportunities for professional growth.
- Friendly working environment.
Contact: https://t.me/tarabrini

https://t.me/JScript_jobs
